amendment.description: To provide for the disclosure of prices paid for HIV/AIDS medicines in developing countries.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2023 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2023 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S13372; text: CR S13372; text as modified: CR 10/31/2003 S13648) To provide for the disclosure of prices paid for HIV/AIDS medicines in developing countries.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2023 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Kennedy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2023 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
